title.ja-ro: Kensei no Osananajimi ga Power Harass de Ore ni Tsuraku Ataru no de, Zetsuen Shite Henkyou de ma Kenshi to Shite Denaosu Koto ni Shita

altTitles.en: A Sword Master Childhood Friend Power Harassed Me Harshly, so I Broke off Our Relationship and Made a Fresh Start at the Frontier as a Magic Swordsman

altTitles.ja: 剣聖の幼馴染がパワハラで俺につらく当たるので、絶縁して辺境で魔剣士として出直すことにした。

description.en:
The power harassment from Alfine ー his girlfriend and childhood friend ー who is the same age, grew up with him, and became adventurers together, is painful. She is a peerless beauty, a person with the title "Sword Master" and called the "Flawless Sword Goddess," a capable woman with achievements recognized by the kingdom and rewarded with appointment as a knight and became a noble. On the other hand, he is treated as that capable woman, Alfine’s accessory, gets abusive language hurled at him by her, and suffers from her harsh power harassment and insults to him as an adventurer, resulting in him losing his dignity as a man and as a person He has resigned himself to spending his daily life in the position of a lover-caretaker.  
  
However, changes came to that daily life. Alfine, who becomes busy as the kingdom's knight, often is unable to take part in adventures. As a result, the times he takes requests alone increases, and he is able to regain his lost dignity. Then he becomes aware of the abnormality of his circumstances. So, to regain himself, he chooses to leave her and her repeated power harassment behind. In addition to all of the equipment he has received until then, he returns his sword, one of a pair they had exchanged when they became adventurers. Declaring that they are over, he leaves the place quickly.  
  
"From now on, I will change my name and appearance and live freely."  
  
As soon as he decides that, everything goes well. When he realizes, he is praised by the people around him and is the greatest adventurer on the frontier. What's more, he got a proposal to marry the frontier lord’s daughter from a female adventurer.

title.ja-ro: RTA Sousha wa Game Sekai kara Kaerenai

altTitles.ja: RTA走者はゲーム世界から帰れない

altTitles.en: Speedrunner Cannot Return from the Game World
The RTA Runner Can't Return From The Game World

altTitles.vi: Bị nhốt trong thế giới game, tôi "speedrun" sạch map

description.en: Our protagonist, the speedrunning emperor of *Another Verse*, suddenly feels sleepy in the middle of practice. When he awakens, the familiar opening of *Another Verse* is playing right before his eyes!? In this godly environment where his body is moving better than usual, he has to speedrun! Clear the game world faster than anyone!
description.ja: RTA（リアルタイムアタック）を極めた男がゲームの世界に召喚された!? 勇者として魔王を倒してほしいと言われるが、バグ技で即RTA攻略してしまう。しかし、ラスボスを倒したのにゲームが終わらなくて…？

altTitles.ja: 海腹川背旬

description.en: A very loose adaptation of the story-light cult-classic Super Famicom/SNES video game of the same name. Umihara Kawase (who spells her name differently, indicating this is an alternate universe story compared to the games) must contend with a sinister organisation and confront the legacy of her oceanographer father with the help of her new friend Kouichi Shioji. Serialised in Comic Burger in 1995, it ran for eight chapters. The first six were collected in tankobon format.

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุง ผจญในแดนปิศาจ!

altTitles.vi: Vào Ma Giới Rồi Đấy! Iruma-kun

altTitles.fa: به مدرسه شیاطین خوش اومدی ایروما!

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament... His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He'll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he's human... Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ja: 両親の私欲で悪魔に売られた不憫な少年・入間くん。孫のいない悪魔に溺愛されて悪魔の学校に通うことになり！？
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity II: Subterranean World of Folklore, Agartha - Women of Agartha

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅱ 伝承地底世界 アガルタ アガルタの女

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten II: Denshou Chitei Sekai, Agartha - Agartha no Onna

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность II: Женщина Агарты

description.en:
Fate/Grand Order official comicalize start!

In 2000 AD, the bottom of the mountain range in Central Asia... In a place where no obvious wars or incidents have been confirmed, "Organization for the Preservation of Human Order, Chaldea" finds the existence of a Singularity. Ritsuka Fujimaru and his team started the Rayshift immediately...
description.ru: Царица Савская ждала, когда Фудзимару и другие проникнут в Кер-Ис, город безнравственности. Мы должны бороться с таинственными силами и их бесконечно растущими подчиненными. В этих бедах внезапно появилась противоборствующая сила "Убийца Ночного Замка"…!

altTitles.ja: ベルサイユのばら

altTitles.th: กุหลาบแวร์ซายส์

altTitles.de: Lady Oscar: Die Rose von Versaille

description.en:
In 1755, in three European countries, three people are born who will eventually have a fateful meeting in Versailles, France. 

Hans Axel von Fersen, born the eldest son of a Swedish senator; Oscar François de Jarge, born the youngest daughter of a French general; and Marie Antoinette, born the princess of Austria and the Habsburgs! 

The great masterpiece that shines in the history of Shojo Manga is finally here!
description.es:
La Rosa de Versalles se centra en Oscar François de Jarjayes, una niña criada como un hombre para convertirse en el sucesor de su padre como líder de la Guardia del Palacio. Combatiente brillante con un fuerte sentido de la justicia, Oscar se enorgullece de la vida que lleva, pero se debate entre la lealtad de su clase social y su deseo de ayudar a los pobres a medida que se avecina la revolución entre la oprimida clase baja

Uno de los aspectos mas importantes de la historia es el dilema que tiene Lady Oscar entre vivir la vida como militante y como mujer regular, así como sus relaciones con María Antonieta, el Conde Axel von Fersen y el sirviente y mejor amigo André Grandier.
description.es-la:
La Rosa de Versalles se centra en Oscar François de Jarjayes, una niña criada como un hombre para convertirse en el sucesor de su padre como líder de la Guardia del Palacio. Combatiente brillante con un fuerte sentido de la justicia, Oscar se enorgullece de la vida que lleva, pero se debate entre la lealtad de su clase social y su deseo de ayudar a los pobres a medida que se avecina la revolución entre la oprimida clase baja

Uno de los aspectos mas importantes de la historia es el dilema que tiene Lady Oscar entre vivir la vida como militante y como mujer regular, así como sus relaciones con María Antonieta, el Conde Axel von Fersen y el sirviente y mejor amigo André Grandier.

altTitles.ja: キッカイくん

description.en: Maka Kikkai is an elementary school student who calls himself a handsome boy on the cutting edge of scientific civilization. He tries to live a comfortable and convenient life with the help of his tutor Mashin Hakase's and his father's inventions, but they always fail and end causing a big ruckus.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have "no prospects with women" and marriage as "something not for him." However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to... force his little sister into doing "that". Driven to his wits' end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to...
___
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.fr:
Gero est l'aîné d'un clan de tueurs à gages spécialisé dans les poisons. Criminel de naissance, malgré son bon fond, il a grandi en marge de la société et s'imagine n'avoir aucune chance de trouver l'amour. Jusqu'au jour où son clan lui lance un ultimatum : s'il ne se marie pas pour donner naissance à un héritier, ils forceront sa petite sœur à le faire !

Or, sa prochaine cible est une arnaqueuse, spécialisée dans les mariages arrangés... Acculé, Gero la supplie alors de l'aider.
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

title.ja-ro: Otome Game no Heroine de Saikyou Survival

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル@COMIC

altTitles.en: The Otome Heroine's Fight for Survival
Strongest Survival with an Otome Game's Heroine

altTitles.fr: L'héroine d'un jeu otome survie en devenant la plus forte

altTitles.zh: 身为女性向游戏的女主角挑战最强生存剧

altTitles.pt-br: A luta da heroína Otome pela sobrevivência

description.en:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she's determined to carve her own path.
___
[Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
description.ja:
剣と魔法の世界シエルで孤児として生きていた少女アーリシア。
ある日、彼女は自分が“乙女ゲームのヒロイン”であると知ってしまう。
両親の死さえ単にストーリーの一部だったのだ。
アーリシアはヒロインの役割を「くだらない」と一刀両断すると、冒険者『アリア』を名乗り、次第に複数の武器と魔法を操る「殺戮（さつりく）の灰かぶり姫」へと成長していく！
だが、“悪役令嬢”の護衛依頼を受けたことで、気付かぬ間に貴族同士が争うゲームの舞台に巻き込まれていき――？
「私は“私”だ。ゲームの登場人物じゃない！」
武器を作れ！　技を鍛えろ！
強敵との戦いに生き残り、乙女ゲームをぶち壊せ！
戦うヒロインが魅せる、壮絶＆爽快な異世界バトルファンタジー！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1391fj/)
Light Novel: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09FF4Y8C2), [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/286726/)
Original Web Publication: [Corona EX](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/20000000054623), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54623)
description.ru:
В мире меча и магии, что звался Сиэль, жила сирота по имени Алисия.
Однажды она узнала, что является героиней отомэ-игры, в которой даже смерть её родителей была лишь частью сценария. Расценив положение героини полнейшим абсурдом, она решительно его отвергнула. Она переродилась как авантюристка Ария, и шаг за шагом мастерски овладела широким арсеналом оружия и магии. Её величали «Пепельная принцесса резни»! Однако, взявшись за задание по охране «злодейки», Алисия, опомниться не успев, обнаружила себя втянутой в конфликты знати…

«Я - это я, а не персонаж какой-то игры!»

Выковать оружие! Закалить тело!
Выжить в борьбе против могущественных врагов и разнести эту чёртову отомэ-игру!
Захватывающая битва нашей героини в величественном мире меча и магии!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1391fj/)
Light Novel: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09FF4Y8C2), [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/286726/)
Original Web Serialization: [Corona EX](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/20000000054623), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54623)

description.en:
She, the leader of the hidden sect, specializes in poison and assassination. A genius, and a weirdo, in the eyes of others. After dying from an accident, she was reborn in the body of a disfigured lady. Having her identity changed and unable to return to her family, she abandoned them, but, if she doesn't take revenge on those who caused her harm, will she be worthy of the title "The Ghostly Doctor"? As clouds gather, heroes fight to be the strongest! How will she conquer the world in a red robe, and fight among the strong heroes?!  
  
*The 2 missing chapters are announcements by the author.  


---
description.fr:
Feng Jiu, spécialisée dans le poison et l'assassinat, génie ou cinglée selon où l'on se place  
Morte des suites d'un accident, elle renaît dans le corps d'une femme défigurée.  
Feng Qing Ge, trahie par la servante qu'elle a recueillie enfant. Celle-ci lui vole son identité, la défigure et l'abandonne dans un bordel.  
Elle permet à Feng Jiu de renaître dans son corps, et avant de mourir lui demande de veiller sur ses parents et d'assouvir sa vengeance. Suivez les aventures de Feng Jiu, le docteur fantôme !
description.pt-br: Ela, a líder da seita oculta, é especializada em veneno e assassinato. Uma gênia, e uma esquisita, aos olhos dos outros. Depois de morrer de um acidente, ela renasceu no corpo de uma senhora desfigurada. Tendo sua identidade mudada e incapaz de retornar à sua família, ela os abandonou, mas, se ela não se vingar daqueles que lhe causaram danos, será ela digna do título de "A Doutora Fantasma"? Enquanto as nuvens se juntam, os heróis lutam para ser os mais fortes! Como ela conquistará o mundo com um manto vermelho, e lutará entre os heróis mais fortes?!

title.en: Fate/ Grand Order: After A Lostbelt (Doujinshi)

description.en:
The story follows Taida(Female Ritsuka), the final master of Chaldea, as her mental health deteriorates after every fight within the Lostbelt, bringing her closer to her breaking point.

Mash and Da Vinci devise a plan to help distract her from her trauma by traveling to a carnival singularity in Romania, But something's a miss, as a darker force lurks within the shadows.

After A Lostbelt is a fan comic with the approval of MangaDex staff.

altTitles.ja: 徳川の猿

description.ja: 時は江戸時代。父の仇討ちのため江戸へやってきた少女剣士・鈴は、宿泊した旅籠で、「天狗」と名乗る謎の武装集団によるたてこもりテロ事件に巻き込まれる。窮地を救ったのは、「猿（ましら）」と呼ばれる女性だけで構成された対「天狗」部隊だった。猿の戦士、目耳口が不自由な月（つき）は、圧倒的な体術で天狗たちを倒してゆく。一癖も二癖もある「猿（ましら）」たちと、「天狗」の戦いを描くハード変格時代アクション！

altTitles.ja: まいるど 7

description.en:
Nagai's ecchi parody of Mikiya Mochizuki's [Wild 7](https://mangadex.org/title/b5e3ba0f-f735-4a32-a617-2bd3db500091/wild-7?tab=chapters)

(from ebookjapan):

The Seven Soldier Family is the world's most powerful mercenary family. We call them the "Mild 7"!  Wherever they go, they have no enemies. Where the Mild 7 goes, Mild 7 kills everyone who stands in their way! Led by hippie dad Dolaemon, 36 years old, the Mild 7 make use of machine guns, missiles, rockets, tanks, fighter planes, and even a submarine battleship, the Yamato, which was converted from the sunken Yamato, in their basement. 

This is Go Nagai's quintessential masterpiece, a messily erotic and violent work!

altTitles.ja: レッド

description.en:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
description.pt-br: Situado na América do século 19, Red é o último sobrevivente vivo de uma tribo nativa americana que foi massacrada por homens brancos. Em uma longa jornada em busca de vingança, ele viaja com Iero Ito, um samurai que fugiu para a América após ser derrotado na guerra civil de Seinan, e Angie, uma misteriosa prostituta. Os laços de amizade entre os três são comoventes. Embora seja tudo ficção, a história parece muito real, pois é baseada em batalhas reais entre tropas americanas, apaches e outras tribos.

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio como Sanador: La Magia de Muerte Instantánea con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental

altTitles.th: การล้างแค้นของผู้กล้าสายฮีล

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し 〜即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi: Sokushi Mahō to Sukiru Kopī no Chōetsu Hīru

altTitles.en: The Healer's Do-Over: Transcendent Healing Through Insta-Kill Magic and Skill Copying

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.ja: 【癒】の勇者ケヤルは、ある日【回復(ヒール)】が最強に至る魔法だと確信する。そして世界そのものを【回復】して四年前に戻り、自分の人生を弄んだ者たちへ復讐することを誓うのだった。
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

title.ja-ro: Kikakugai no Dungeon Kouryakusha, Jitsu wa Isekai Kaeri no Moto Yuusha

altTitles.ja: 規格外のダンジョン攻略者、実は異世界帰りの元勇者

altTitles.en: The Overpowered Dungeon Conqueror Is Actually a Former Hero Who Returned from Another World

description.en:
In an era overtaken by dungeons, hunters who make a living by conquering them have risen to prominence. After killing the demon lord in another world, the former hero Yuuki Rento returned tired of wars and vowed to spend his remaining life peacefully playing video games. However, when his friend discovered his identity and dragged him into the job of conquering dungeons, his overpowered abilities quickly become known across the world.

"At this rate, I won't even have time to play my gal games!"

Will the day Rento can finally enjoy a peaceful life ever come...?!
description.ja:
ダンジョンが出現し、その攻略を生業にする能力者たちが活躍する現代。異世界で魔王を倒し帰還した元勇者、勇気蓮人(ゆうきれんと）は戦いに疲れ、ゲーム三昧の平和な暮らしを満喫したいと願っていた。しかし、かつての友人によってその正体を見抜かれダンジョン攻略に駆り出されると、規格外の実力は瞬く間に世間に知れ渡ってしまう…。

「このままではギャルゲーをやる時間もなくなってしまう！」

果たして蓮人が平穏な生活を享受できる日は来るのか…！

altTitles.ja: 学園帝国　俺はジュウベイ！
レイリ

description.en:
Sengoku Period (1579): a young woman who has lost everything dedicates herself to seeking strength and a death on the battlefield. 
Reiri once lived happily with her family, until the day a group of soldiers came by after a battle and started a senseless slaughter. 
Her father, mother and brother sacrificed themselves in order for her to survive but she was truly saved only after the intervention 
of Okabe Tanpa no Kami, a warrior which had been sheltering in the village. In his service, she grew and learned to fight excellently, 
chasing her goal of a death in battle. However, her path to death may not be as short and straight as she hopes…  
  
- **2020 3rd Takao Saitou Award winner**
  


---
description.tr:
Hikâye 1579 yılında başlar. Ailesiyle sıradan ve mutlu bir hayat süren Reiri isimli küçük kız, başına gelen bir olay sonucunda kana susamış bir savaşçıya dönüşür. Bu olay onu yıpratsa da bulduğu motivasyon sayesinde ayakta kalır. Reiri zamanla hem fiziksel olarak güçlenir hem de mental olarak değişir. Savaş, savaşçılar, yeni insanlar ve yeni ortamlarda bulunan Reiri yaşama tutunabilecek mi? Yaşadığı trajik olayı geride bırakıp sonunda mutluluğu bulabilecek mi? Yoksa sadece ölmek için yaşamayı arzulayan, fikirleri ve duyguları olmayan biri olarak mı kalacak?  
  
- 3. Takao Saitou Ödüllünü kazandı.

altTitles.en: Violence Jack - Advent of the Demon Lord

altTitles.ja: バイオレンスジャック
バイオレンスジャック　魔王降臨編

description.en:
September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.
description.vi: Hắn sở hữu cơ bắp của một con gorilla. Cùng bộ nanh của loài sói. Ngon lửa khai thiên lập địa rực cháy trong đôi mắt hắn. Cơ thể hắn cao hơn 2 mét. Người ta gọi hắn là Jack! Violence Jack!

altTitles.ja: あやかしトライアングル

description.en:
Ever since he was a boy, Matsuri Kazamaki has worked as an exorcist. Because his childhood friend Suzu Kanade attracts malicious spirits called ayakashi like moths to a flame, Matsuri is tasked with slaying any with ill intentions.

One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuri’s chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell…
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/ayakashi-triangle/)
description.fr: Depuis son enfance, Matsuri Kazamaki travaille comme exorciste. Parce que son ami d'enfance Suzu Kanade attire à une flamme des esprits malveillants appelés ayakashi comme des papillons de nuit, Matsuri est chargé de tuer tous ceux qui ont de mauvaises intentions. Un jour, un ayakashi nommé Shirogane remarque la romance naissante entre ces deux amis d'enfance. Désireux à la fois de dévorer Suzu et de déjouer les chances de Matsuri de s'aimer, il exécute un sort interdit…
description.it: Il Giappone sembra invaso da misteriosi mostri chiamati Ayakashi, ma a contrastare la minaccia esiste una forza speciale, i ninja esorcisti! Il giovane ninja esorcista Matsuri passa le giornate a combatterli e a proteggere la sua amica d'infanzia Suzu. Quando appare un ayakashi chiamato Shirogane, le cose si stravolgono! Kentaro Yabuki torna su Shonen Jump con una nuova serie fantasy, ricca di ayakashi e romanticismo!
description.ru:
Японию начали наводнять таинственные монстры — Аякаси. Ниндзя-экзорцист по имени Мацури неустанно борется с ними изо дня в день, чтобы уберечь себя и свою подругу детства Сузу. Однако, после появления кота-аякаси по имени Широганэ, всё переворачивается с ног на голову!  
Сможет ли наш отважный герой справиться с возникшей напастью? С этого и начинается наше приключение от всеми известного мангаки Кэнтаро Ябуки, который вернулся в Джамп со своей новой фэнтези историей с привкусом романтики!
description.pt-br:
Desde menino, Matsuri Kazamaki trabalha como exorcista.  Porque seu amigo de infância Suzu Kanade atrai espíritos maliciosos chamados ayakashi como mariposas para uma chama, Matsuri é encarregado de matar qualquer um com más intenções.
  
Um dia, um ayakashi chamado Shirogane percebe o romance entre esses dois amigos de infância.  Ansioso para devorar Suzu e frustrar a chance de amor de Matsuri, ele realiza um feitiço proibido…
  
|| A mais nova série de Kentaro Yabuki, criador de Black Cat e artista por trás de To Love Ru e Darling in the Franxx. ||

altTitles.ja: おいら女蛮

description.en:
His family name is Suke and his given name is Banji, but he's known as Sukeban. Any town the Suke house settles in just can't contain the violent nature of this family, forcing them to move time and time again. Because of his name, Banji ends up transferring to Amazon School as a female student! However, this situation coupled with Sukeban's rebellious nature undoubtedly will result in mayhem littered with maddening jokes and lewdity.

The manga has been adapted into two live-action films and an OVA.

altTitles.ja: エロイカより愛をこめて

description.en:
What happens when a gay art thief and a conservative NATO officer cross paths? Disaster, of course. 
Dorian is an aristocrat, a thief, and a hedonist; Klaus is a duty-driven espionage agent with no patience for fools.

Follow them as they chase each other across the globe – from Britain to Baghdad, from Alaska to Alexandria or Moscow to Madrid. 
Spectacular locations and non-stop adventures await!

altTitles.ja: ハレンチ学園

description.en:
The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.

altTitles.ja: 黒姫士アイアンドレス

description.en:
Yuuta, a young boy, is transported to the Demon World via his sister's experiment gone wrong.
He becomes the "little chick" underling of Princess Knight Beri, and his days become filled with eroticism!

A fantasy epic drawn by popular "Puni" artist Zankuro!

title.en: Fate/ Grand Order: After A Singularity (Doujinshi)

description.en:
The story follows Taida (Female Ritsuka), the final master of Chaldea, and her shenanigans with her friends, Mash, Astolfo, and Mordred, across Chaldea and its residents after every singularity.

After A Singularity is a fan comic with the approval of MangaDex staff.

altTitles.ja: 寄宿学校のジュリエット

altTitles.th: รักลับๆ ข้ามหอของนายหมากับน้องแมว

altTitles.vi: Nàng Juliet ở trường nội trú

description.en:
Juliet Persia and Inuzuka Romio are archenemies. They lead two high school dormitories from two rivaling countries. Both factions are dead set on defeating the other to gain control over the island they have to share. Beneath the feuding exterior, however, Persia and Inuzuka long for love and peace for their budding relationship…

---
At Dahlia Academy, a prestigious boarding school attended by students of two feuding countries - the eastern Nation of Touwa, and the Principality of West. Romio Inuzuka, leader of the dorms' Touwa first-years, wishes for a romance that can never be. For his ladylove is none other than his arch-enemy, Juliet Persia, leader of the dorms' West first-years! Is Inuzuka ready to risk it all to confess his feelings? And even if Persia somehow agrees to go out with them, how long can they keep a forbidden relationship under wraps?
description.it:
Juliet Persia e Romio Inuzuka sono a capo di due dormitori rivali presso l'accademia privata Dahlia, in cui risiedono gli studenti appartenenti a due paesi differenti, i "Black Doggy" e i "White Cat". Le due fazioni sono in guerra tra loro per contendersi il controllo dell'isola in cui vivono. Juliet e Romio si dimostrano agli occhi dei loro compagni di dormitorio come acerrimi nemici, ma in realtà sono segretamente innamorati l'uno dell'altra e costretti a mantenere nascosta la loro relazione per non subire ripercussioni.  
  
  
 **Links:**   
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3628803)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/yousukekaneda)
description.ru:
История проходит в школе-интернате Далия, престижной школе на изолированном острове, где учатся студенты из Восточной страны и Западного княжества. Враждебные отношения соседних стран не меняются и внутри школы — день изо дня между учениками происходят стычки из-за взаимной неприязни. К этой и без того напряжённой ситуации добавляется то, что Ромио Инудзука, лидер первокурсников из общежития Восточной страны, известного как «Чёрные собаки», и Джульетта Персия, лидер первокурсников из общежития Западного княжества, известного как «Белые кошки», тайно влюблены друг в друга!
Об этих отношениях, невзирая ни на какие обстоятельства, абсолютно никто не должен узнать!
description.vi: Inuzuka Romio và Juliet Persia đang hẹn hò, song vì xuất thân từ hai đất nước đối địch nên họ không thể công khai mối quan hệ dù học chung một trường. Nhưng tình hình đã có sự thay đổi nhờ Hasuki - người bạn thơ ấu đem lòng thương Inuzuka!
description.pt-br: Juliet Persia e Inuzuka Romio são arqui-inimigos. Eles lideram dois dormitórios de ensino médio de dois países rivais. Ambas as facções estão decididas a derrotar a outra para ganhar o controle sobre a ilha que elas têm para compartilhar. Por baixo do exterior de rivalidade, no entanto, Persia e Inuzuka anseiam por amor e paz para seu relacionamento em desenvolvimento...

altTitles.ja: コトダマ叶えて！ ときえ先生

altTitles.en: Through the Power of Words, Grant Me My Wishes, Tokie-sensei

description.en: In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students.
description.ja: 小学校で教師を務める御吾妻時恵は、生徒たちに言霊の大切さを教えようとしていた。ボサボサにのびた髪にジャージ姿と、陰気な格好をしていた彼女に対し、生徒たちが綺麗にしてほしいと声をかけた瞬間、彼女の姿は美しく変貌した!! 言霊の力を目の当たりにした生徒たちは、ときえ先生に次々と言霊を投げかけていく…!!

title.en: Yuusha Party kara Oidasareta Fuguushoku [Wanashi] Yunikku Sukiru [Yajirushi] de Saikyou ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティから追い出された不遇職【罠士】、ユニークスキル【矢印】で最強になる

altTitles.en: The Unfortunate "Trapper" Cast Out of the Hero's Party Will Defy Fate and Become the Strongest with the Unique Skill "Arrow"
The Unfortunate "Trapper" Who was Kicked Out of the Hero's Party Becomes the Strongest with His Unique Skill, "Arrow".

altTitles.id: Job Tidak Berguna "Ahli Perangkap" yang Dibuang dari Party Pahlawan, Jadi yang Terkuat dengan Skill Unik "Panah Arah"

description.en:
"That’s why... as of today, you're out of the party."

Forty years have passed since dungeons began appearing across the world. Keiichiro, a member of an elite S-rank adventurer party, is suddenly expelled by his childhood friend for being "too weak." His job, Trapper, is seen as useless—after all, it lacks any offensive abilities. Stripped of his future as an adventurer, Keiichiro sinks into despair—until he encounters a mysterious girl who grants him a unique skill.

The skill, Arrow, shatters the limitations of a Trapper, transforming him into an unstoppable force. Determined to reclaim his place as an adventurer, Keiichiro embarks on a journey to become the strongest!
description.ja:
「だから貴方には……今日でパーティを抜けてもらうことにしました」
 
世界中にダンジョンが現れて40年。
 
S級冒険者パーティに所属する、景一郎は幼馴染から戦力不足という理由で追い出される。
彼の職業【罠士】は自分から攻撃できないというハズレ職だったのだ。
 
冒険者生命を絶たれ絶望していた景一郎は、
謎の少女と出会いユニークスキルを授かることに・・・！？
 
そのスキルは【矢印】――
【罠士】の弱点を覆す最強のスキルだった。
 
もう一度冒険者への道を歩み始めた景一郎は、最強を目指し成り上がる！

altTitles.ja: 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

title.ja-ro: Kuchidome no Gohoubi wa Dansou Otome to Ichaero Desu!

altTitles.ja: 口止めのご褒美は男装乙女とイチャエロです！THE COMIC

altTitles.en: The Reward For Keeping Quiet Was Sex With Girls Dressed As Men

description.en: Kay Brennan is a hero, no doubt about that. They're the strongest person in their school in terms of combat strength and magical power. Compared to Kay, Dino Turner - the eternal 2nd place - might as well be nothing, and as such Dino has declared Kay to be his archrival. However, Kay has a secret: she's actually a girl crossdressing as a boy. And Dino is the only one who knows her true nature.
description.id:
Kay, disebut-sebut sebagai orang terkuat dan terkuat di Akademi. Namun, Dino, yang merupakan saingan Kay, tahu bahwa dia sebenarnya adalah seorang gadis cantik yang berpakaian seperti pria.

"Jika kau merahasiakannya, kau bisa melakukan apapun dengan tubuhku"

Dino akan menerima keahlian Kay sebagai hadiah karena tidak memberi tahu rahasianya. seperti sepasang kekasih yang kecanduan Ero Play. sementara itu gadis berpakaian laki-laki lain juga muncul!?

"Ayo lakukan pelayanan yang baik sebagai ganti menutup mulut"

Sebuah fantasi akademi kecil di mana orang-orang muda bertujuan untuk mencapai yang tertinggi bekerja keras dengan saingan yang menarik!
description.ja: 学園最強の実力者にして勇者と謳われるケイト。しかし、実は男装した美少女だということを、ライバルであるディノは知ってしまう。ディノは口止めの報酬としてケイトのエッチな奉仕にハマっていくなか、もう一人のライバル、黒髪剣士アキラも男装乙女だったと知ることに。果たして学園生活のゆくえは――！？

altTitles.ja: ベオグラードメトロの子供たち

description.en:
In the year 20XX, reports start coming in about psychics appearing throughout the countryside of rural Serbia in the former Yugoslavia.

The government creates a law to punish those who use their powers, which manages to keep the peace - at least, on the surface.

Ten years later...

Cyzki, a boy who has moved to Belgrade, the capital of Serbia, has just run away from home.
Abandoned for four years after the construction was halted, he wanders into the abandoned Belgrade Metro.
However, it is a hangout for people with abilities who have no time to spare.

Due to the "hunt for Psychics" started by the Golden Dawn, a large corporation that controls Belgrade, he was placed in a difficult situation.

Furthermore, Cyzki meets Mariya, the daughter of Golden Dawn, and falls in love with her at first sight.
In an attempt to get close to her extreme male chauvinist ideology, he ends up dressing as a woman in order to get close to her.
As he pursues the mystery of the psychics, the more involved he gets into her life, the more ambitious our hero becomes.

Adaptation of [Children of Belgrade Metro](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355500/_/)

😼🎨 Jazz is a meta-cat with a warm heart, but a painful past keeps her in a loop of distrust, fear, and loneliness. 💪😘 Loreen is a paladin who learned to care for other people much more than she cares for herself, hiding her suffering behind a mask of forced happiness that makes her lonely as well. Together they could destroy each other… or heal.❤️‍🩹 Despite the depressing premise, it’s a funny comic! 🤭
